Module.Name: Grove OLED 96x96
Module.Overview: The OLED 96x96 twig is a 16 color grayscale 96Ã—96 dot matrix OLED display module with Grove compatible 4pin I2C interface. The OLED 96x96 twig is constructed with 96 x 96 dot matrix OLED module ([LY120]) and SSD1327 driver IC. The characteristics of this display module are high brightness, self-emission, high contrast ratio, slim / thin outline, wide viewing angle, wide temperature range, and low power consumption.
